column1: '''Conan Stevens''' portrayed a [[Keeper of the Dungeons
column2: Gundabad Orc]] in ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' and in  ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''. In the third film he is credited as Keeper of Dungeons. He was originally cast as [[Azog]], Bolg's father, but switched roles during filming.<ref name="TORNBolg">{{webcite
